tags: i have seen no spoilers which is kind of a miracle
summary: Seeing Solo today, I’m hearing from some people that it’s better then Rogue One and from others that  it’s worse so at this...
body: Seeing Solo today, I’m hearing from some people that it’s better then Rogue One and from others that it’s worse so at this point I’m just not gonna expect anything going in. Only thing I do know is that apparently every single other character is far more interesting and captivating then the title of the damn movie himself so I don’t know how to feel about that.

reblog.comment: Seeing Solo today, I’m hearing from some people that it’s better then Rogue One and from others that it’s worse so at this point I’m just not gonna expect anything going in. Only thing I do know is that apparently every single other character is far more interesting and captivating then the title of the damn movie himself so I don’t know how to feel about that.

Only thing I do know is that apparently every single other character is far more interesting and captivating then the title of the damn movie himself so I don’t know how to feel about that.

summary: Solo: A Star Wars Story Reveals the Fate of an Infamous Bounty Hunter
title: Solo: A Star Wars Story Reveals the Fate of an Infamous Bounty Hunter
body:
Solo: A Star Wars Story Reveals the Fate of an Infamous Bounty Hunter

**Warning Spoilers for Solo: A Star Wars Story Below**

Solo: A Star Wars Storywas every bit of a Star Wars movie. Not only did the film feature three of the main characters from the original trilogy in Han Solo, Chewbacca, and Lando Calrissian, but it also connected to the prequel trilogies with a surprise appearance by Darth Maul. However, there was also a reference to one of the most infamous…

summary: War. It’s all you’ve ever known isn’t it? You were so young when you survived the Clone War. No wonder you’re as equipped in...
text: War. It’s all you’ve ever known isn’t it? You were so young when you survived the Clone War. No wonder you’re as equipped in spirit to fight as well as you do. War is in your blood, I.. study the Art of War. Work to perfect it, but you. You were forged by it.
source: Thrawn to Hera Syndulla(Star Wars Rebels)

summary: How to push your female friends to go see Solo
title: How to push your female friends to go see Solo
body:
Me: well, there is this character, Dryden Vos... *shows picture*

Female friend (FF): oh my, he is sexy.

Me: he is not human as well.

FF: now i'm even more interested, continue.

Me: the stripes on his face are not scars.

FF: ?

Me: they're his character species' specific feature. They go red when he gets emotional.

FF: !!!

Me: as do his eyes.

FF: !!!!!!!!!!

Me: he's also very good at fighting with knifes.

FF: OK OK I'M ALREADY BUYING A TICKET

it just keeps working every time

blog.name: minerfromtarn
blog.title: Towards Peace
blog.description:
"Be he foe or friend, be he foul or clean,

brood of Morgoth or bright Vala,

Elda or Maia or Aftercomer,

Man yet unborn upon Middle-earth,

neither law, nor love, nor league of swords,

dread nor danger, not Doom itself,

shall defend him from Fëanor, and Fëanor's kin,

whoso hideth or hoardeth, or in hand taketh,

finding keepeth or afar casteth

a Silmaril. This swear we all:

death we will deal him ere Day's ending,

woe unto world's end! Our word hear thou,

Eru Allfather! To the everlasting

Darkness doom us if our deed faileth.

On the holy mountain hear in witness

and our vow remember, Manwë and Varda!"

Bi/nonbinary, any pronoun works, Decepticon, Converting to Judaism

summary: I think what's so great about the Star Wars Legacy comics is how the lead characters return to where Luke and Leia were before...
body: I think what’s so great about the Star Wars Legacy comics is how the lead characters return to where Luke and Leia were before the main events of the Original Trilogy. Cade Skywalker ignores his past. He doesn’t want to be the Hero™ that everyone says he should be just because he’s a Skywalker. He wants anonymity and people to just see him as Cade, not as Anakin/Vader/Luke’s descendant. And he does not want adventure or a heroic destiny. He strives to have the same anonymity that Luke had back on Tatooine. Meanwhile, Princess Marisiah Fel is the royal heiress that Leia was before Alderaan was destroyed. Marisiah is able to have the future that her anscestor Leia was denied and leads as a just monarch and fiercely protects her people against evil while on the throne. And she goes from being an exiled princess of a usurped Empire to the Empress of the Empire and leads the Galaxy as a whole in what really looks like the final end of the Sith. Their stories are just so great an inverse of Luke and Leia, not to say either pair had a bad story, that they stand out among the characters of Star Wars.

Cade Skywalker ignores his past. He doesn’t want to be the Hero™ that everyone says he should be just because he’s a Skywalker. He wants anonymity and people to just see him as Cade, not as Anakin/Vader/Luke’s descendant. And he does not want adventure or a heroic destiny. He strives to have the same anonymity that Luke had back on Tatooine. Meanwhile, Princess Marisiah Fel is the royal heiress that Leia was before Alderaan was destroyed. Marisiah is able to have the future that her anscestor Leia was denied and leads as a just monarch and fiercely protects her people against evil while on the throne. And she goes from being an exiled princess of a usurped Empire to the Empress of the Empire and leads the Galaxy as a whole in what really looks like the final end of the Sith. Their stories are just so great an inverse of Luke and Leia, not to say either pair had a bad story, that they stand out among the characters of Star Wars.

trail.content_raw: I think what’s so great about the Star Wars Legacy comics is how the lead characters return to where Luke and Leia were before the main events of the Original Trilogy. Cade Skywalker ignores his past. He doesn’t want to be the Hero™ that everyone says he should be just because he’s a Skywalker. He wants anonymity and people to just see him as Cade, not as Anakin/Vader/Luke’s descendant. And he does not want adventure or a heroic destiny. He strives to have the same anonymity that Luke had back on Tatooine. Meanwhile, Princess Marisiah Fel is the royal heiress that Leia was before Alderaan was destroyed. Marisiah is able to have the future that her anscestor Leia was denied and leads as a just monarch and fiercely protects her people against evil while on the throne. And she goes from being an exiled princess of a usurped Empire to the Empress of the Empire and leads the Galaxy as a whole in what really looks like the final end of the Sith. Their stories are just so great an inverse of Luke and Leia, not to say either pair had a bad story, that they stand out among the characters of Star Wars.
trail.content: I think what’s so great about the Star Wars Legacy comics is how the lead characters return to where Luke and Leia were before the main events of the Original Trilogy. Cade Skywalker ignores his past. He doesn’t want to be the Hero™ that everyone says he should be just because he’s a Skywalker. He wants anonymity and people to just see him as Cade, not as Anakin/Vader/Luke’s descendant. And he does not want adventure or a heroic destiny. He strives to have the same anonymity that Luke had back on Tatooine. Meanwhile, Princess Marisiah Fel is the royal heiress that Leia was before Alderaan was destroyed. Marisiah is able to have the future that her anscestor Leia was denied and leads as a just monarch and fiercely protects her people against evil while on the throne. And she goes from being an exiled princess of a usurped Empire to the Empress of the Empire and leads the Galaxy as a whole in what really looks like the final end of the Sith. Their stories are just so great an inverse of Luke and Leia, not to say either pair had a bad story, that they stand out among the characters of Star Wars.

summary: trust the force, trust in us ( 3/3 )
title: trust the force, trust in us ( 3/3 )
body:
Legacy of Scarif ( what we do today matters )

leg·a·cy noun

1. something that someone has achieved that continues to exist after they stop working or die
2. the principle that a thing which exists as a result of something that happened in the past can later be used in a different way

Jyn Erso reimagined ( if she were still with the Partisans )
Word Count: 3173
Rating: Teen

Jyn Erso Appreciation Week ♡ Day 7 Writing Prompt: Legacy

She can’t believe she’s doing this… approaching Yavin without clearance codes, against Saw’s orders, but this has to be done. She can’t go back to Jedha. This ship was marked, and there was an Imperial presence on the planet as it was. No, she had to go to the Rebellion, to those that she knew that could make a difference, that would make a difference. How many times had she listened in as they lamented knowing that the Empire had a terrible plan, but they didn’t know what it was…

And here she is, approaching with answers to questions they hadn’t even begun to ask.

“Base One, this is Lieutenant Jyn Gerrera of the Partisans. I have valuable information for the Council.”

She had been saying this on repeat on every channel as they begun to approach, because they were in an Imperial Cargo Shuttle, and she was not going to be shot down now.

“Cargo Shuttle, we need your clearance codes.”

She knows they’re out of date, so she won’t even bother, particularly because she recognizes that voice.

“Wedge Antilles, you clear me for landing, or I’m going to come in there and beat you bloody.”

READ IT ON AO3

summary: Tbh the worst thing about Anakin is how relatable I find him like he really feels like his family's against him, kinda for...
body: Tbh the worst thing about Anakin is how relatable I find him like he really feels like his family’s against him, kinda for reasonable reasons but that doesn’t excuse his anger and suspicion and he makes snowballing bad decisions and has dodgy vaguely wavy brown hair and generally makes terrible decision after decision in part due to his paranoid way of seeing the world

summary:
She only had 5 minutes of screen time already I would die for Enfys Nest. Those freckles give me so much life. 

 Solo was...
caption:
She only had 5 minutes of screen time already I would die for Enfys Nest. Those freckles give me so much life.

Solo was actually kind of good. It inspired me to make a (really) rough sketch of Enfys Nest (missing half her breast plate decor and an eye because I can’t be bothered).
